source:
%%sql
-- DBXDH.DHT_OFFICE_SPACE definition
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS etlhubConfirmed.DHT_OFFICE_SPACE  (	
SPACE_KEY INT NOT NULL,
VERSION INT NOT NULL ,
BUSINESS_ID VARCHAR(264),
CAMPUS_ID VARCHAR(64),
BUILDING_ID VARCHAR(64),
FLOOR_ID VARCHAR(64),
FLOOR_DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(128),
SPACE_ID VARCHAR(128),
SPACE_DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(512),
SPACE_STATUS VARCHAR(64),
SPACE_CATEGORY_CODE VARCHAR(64),
SPACE_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(512),
SPACE_TYPE_CODE VARCHAR(64),
SPACE_TYPE_DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(512),
OCCUPANCY_TYPE VARCHAR(256),
CAPACITY INTEGER,
AREA_SQUARE_FEET INTEGER ,
OSCRE_CODE VARCHAR(64),
WORKPOINT VARCHAR(64),
RSYP_ID VARCHAR(64),
CURRENT_IND	VARCHAR(1), -- Y for active row and N for all rows expired
EXTRACT_DT TIMESTAMP, -- Load Cycle date, contains same value for all the records inserted in a single batch
REC_START_DT TIMESTAMP, --SCD TYpe 2 start date
REC_END_DT TIMESTAMP, -- SCD Type 2 End date, will have high date (9999-12-31) for active dimensional row
SOURCE_SYSTEM STRING, -- Name of the source system
REC_CHECKSUM STRING, -- Hash value of all dimensional columns. Used to identify changed records 
IMG_LST_UPD_DT TIMESTAMP, --Timestamp of when the record got updated in table
IMG_CREATED_DT TIMESTAMP --Timestamp of when the record got inserted in table
)
USING DELTA
PARTITIONED BY (CURRENT_IND)
LOCATION 'abfss://etlhubfilestorage@adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/deltalake/dimensions/DHT_OFFICE_SPACE_n'
